column5: We welcome you to what we hope is true Texas hospitality! We are Randy and Sara Jane Carter and we are the third generation to own this home. We are lifetime Dentonites and love this opportunity to share something that holds so very many happy memories for us! We hope you will think of the CORAL DOOR DENTON as your “home away from home”!
column8: Coral Door Denton 3 blocks from DOWNTOWN!
